alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 17 at 10:02AM MDT until March 17 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected, except up to 50 mph in the Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley, Northwest Highlands, Chuska Mountains and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur around mid day and into the early afternoon.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau
